mapper.select: select wp.paraphrase_id, wp.paraphrase_english, wp.paraphrase_english_translate, wp.meaning_chinese, wp.translate_language, if(temp.collect_id is null, 'N', 'Y') is_collect from (select wpsr.paraphrase_id collect_id from word_paraphrase_star_rel wpsr left join word_paraphrase_star_list wpsl on wpsr.list_id = wpsl.id where wpsl.owner = #{queryParams.owner} and wpsl.is_del='N') temp right join word_paraphrase wp on temp.collect_id = wp.paraphrase_id where wp.character_id = #{queryParams.entityId} and wp.is_del = 'N'

select distinct(paraphrase_id) from word_paraphrase wp where wp.is_del = 0 and exists(select 1 from word_main wm where wm.word_id = wp.word_id) and not exists(select 1 from word_review_audio wra where wra.source_id = wp.paraphrase_id) limit 10;
